mapper.update: update navigation set alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_publish = #{isPublish,jdbcType=BIT}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stem = #{stem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, alias, description, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, article_id from navigation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, alias, description, is_publish, keyword, sort, stem, style, thumb, title, url, article_id from navigation
